pr_title: [DOCS] Adds http to elasticsearch-certutil command reference

timeline.message: [DOCS] Adds http to elasticsearch-certutil command reference

timeline.bodyText:
This should be http (no --) because it's a command rather than an option.
I think that means we want to put it at the top of the parameters list (after ca, cert, csr) as well.
timeline.author: tvernum
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -151,6 +166,9 @@ parameter cannot be used with the `ca` parameter.
 
 `-h, --help`:: Returns all of the command parameters.
 
+`--http`:: Generates a new certificate or certificate request for the {es} HTTP
+interface.
+

timeline.message: [DOCS] Fixes location of certutil http definition
